long_description: Maximize your vehicle's carrying capacity with the spacious Yakima SkyBox 21 roof box. Low-profile aerodynamic shape cuts down on drag and wind noise while driving. Lid is 3 times stiffer than non-SkyBox-series lids, cutting down on vibrations and making it simple to open and close. Rapid-fire installation is quick and easy; all adjusting and tightening is done from inside the box. Dual-sided opening allows easy access from either side of your vehicle; improved SuperLatch(TM) design can be operated with 1 hand and ensures your lid is locked. Smooth-action support lets the lid lift effortlessly; wide-mouth opening is easy to load and unload. Matte anti-scratch finish gives a stealth look to your vehicle. SkyBox series has an integrated track system for accessories so you can protect and organize all your gear. SKS lock cores included. Fits round, square and most factory-rack crossbars (sold separately); fits crossbar spreads as short as 24 in. Crossbars are required for mounting.
short_description: Maximize your vehicle's carrying capacity with the spacious Yakima SkyBox 21 roof box.
